mapper.select: select * from t_lottery_use_record where 1=1 and id =#{id} FOR UPDATE
select count(1) from t_lottery_use_record where 1=1 and user_id=#{userId} and award_type=1

select *, case when status=0 then '可使用' else '已使用' end as STATUS_z, case when status=0 then '使用' else '不可操作' end as STATUS_c from t_lottery_use_record where 1=1 and user_id=#{userId} and award_type=1 order by ADD_TIME desc
mapper.sql: lur.ID, lur.USER_ID, lur.LOTTERY_ID, lur.LOTTERY_GOODS_ID, lur.STATUS, lur.ADD_TIME, lur.AWARD_TYPE, lur.LOTTERY_GOODS_NAME, lur.AWARD_NUM, lur.AWARD_MONEY, lur.OVERDUE_TIME, lur.DRAW_TIME, lur.REMARK, lur.PLATFORM
mapper.update: update t_lottery_use_record set status= 1, draw_time= #{drawTime} where 1=1 and id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
,m.USERNAME as username FROM t_lottery_use_record lur, rocky_member m WHERE lur.USER_ID = m.ID AND lur.AWARD_TYPE in(1,2,4,5,6) AND lur.ADD_TIME >= #{date} order by lur.id desc limit 20
select sum(t2.use_num) as use_num from t_lottery_use_record t1 INNER JOIN t_lottery_chance_info t2 on t1.lottery_id = t2.id where 1=1 and t1.user_id = #{userId}
select count(1) from t_lottery_use_record where 1=1 and user_id=#{userId} and AWARD_TYPE=2

select *, case when status=0 then '未发放 ' when status=2 then '受理中' when status=3 then '派发中' when status=4 then '已过期' else '已领取' end as STATUS_z, case when status=0 then '领取' when status=3 then '确认收货' else '不可操作' end as STATUS_c from t_lottery_use_record where 1=1 and user_id=#{userId} and AWARD_TYPE=2 order by ADD_TIME desc

select t1.LOTTERY_GOODS_NAME, t1.ADD_TIME, t1.OVERDUE_TIME, case when status=0 then '未发放 ' when status=2 then '受理中' when status=3 then '派发中' when status=4 then '已过期' else '已领取' end as STATUS_z, t1.REMARK, t2.contact, t2.mobile, t2.address, t2.postcode, t2.express_company, t2.express_code from t_lottery_use_record t1 INNER JOIN t_lottery_goods_send_info t2 on t1.id = t2.LOTTERY_USE_RECORD_ID where 1=1 and t1.id = #{id} and t2.LOTTERY_USE_RECORD_ID = #{id} and t1.user_id=${userId} and t2.user_id =${userId}

select count(1) from ( select t1.*, case when t1.status=0 then '未发放' when t1.status=1 then '已领取' when t1.status=2 then '受理中' when t1.status=3 then '派发中' else '已过期' end as STATUS_z, t3.NAME from t_lottery_use_record t1 INNER JOIN t_lottery_chance_info t2 on t1.LOTTERY_ID = t2.id INNER JOIN t_lottery_chance_rule_info t3 on t2.LOTTERY_CHANCE_RULE_INFO_ID = t3.id where 1=1 and (t1.AWARD_TYPE=1 or t1.AWARD_TYPE=2 or t1.AWARD_TYPE=4 or t1.AWARD_TYPE=5) and t1.user_id=${userId} order by t1.ADD_TIME desc ) as tb1

select t1.*, case when t1.status=0 then '未发放' when t1.status=1 then '已领取' when t1.status=2 then '受理中' when t1.status=3 then '派发中' else '已过期' end as STATUS_z, t3.NAME from t_lottery_use_record t1 INNER JOIN t_lottery_chance_info t2 on t1.LOTTERY_ID = t2.id INNER JOIN t_lottery_chance_rule_info t3 on t2.LOTTERY_CHANCE_RULE_INFO_ID = t3.id where 1=1 and (t1.AWARD_TYPE=1 or t1.AWARD_TYPE=2 or t1.AWARD_TYPE=4 or t1.AWARD_TYPE=5 or t1.AWARD_TYPE=6) and t1.user_id = ${userId} order by t1.ADD_TIME desc

select
,m.USERNAME as username FROM t_lottery_use_record lur, rocky_member m WHERE lur.USER_ID = m.ID AND lur.LOTTERY_GOODS_NAME in('Iphone6手机','1888元现金','微软Surface Pro 3','携程旅游充值卡') order by lur.id desc limit 10
